trans-unit.source: Order - select one or more fields for the order
Order Direction - the direction of the order
Max Results - any number or empty for no limit
Logical Operator - if multiple categories selected, this operator change the result
Include Subcategories - include all subcategories with or without start category
Categories - select categories to show portfolio items
Custom Selection - select items manually, overwrites cat selection
Exclude - select items to exclude from list
List Page - select the page of the list view
Detail Page - select the page of the detail view
